name: Identity
description: Identity is a new breed of massively multiplayer online role-playing game where hundreds of players interact in a world of absolute freedom. It's the actions of players which determine your fate and the fate of the world you live in.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 64-Bit Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster. Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or AMD Radeon 6870 HD series DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 14 GB available space
